name: GetCRAFT Pte Ltd
description: Provider of content network services designed to discover and connect to content creators and marketers across the globe. The company helps to find creators and sponsored channels for content marketing, influencer marketing, and bespoke native advertising needs, enabling companies and agencies to get high-quality content at an affordable price.
one_liner: Provider of content network services designed to discover and connect to content creators and marketers across the globe. The company helps to find creators and sponsored channels for content marketing, influencer marketing, and bespoke native advertising needs, enabling companies and agencies to get high-quality content at an affordable price.
